title: The Metaverse - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/9/22
itunes:title: The Metaverse - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/9/22
description:
George Noory and author John Truman Wolfe discuss the Metaverse, a virtual reality that exists solely on the internet, how digital real estate and sneakers can be sold for thousands or even millions of dollars, and how this will impact the future of cryptocurrency.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
